name: Sheep Farm Pincushion and Toppers
description:
These are going like hot cakes! They sold out at my last show and are selling fast here too. This is a new line of really cute pincushions made with coffee cups, egg holders, and other cute containers. This one is made with a sweet egg holder, and has adorable imported fabric from Japan. Fabric has sheep, houses, trees, and french sayings with a green background. I have specially made pin toppers out clay, then cured and glazed them to go with the cushion. A must have for the collector or sewer. A lot of my customers by these as gifts. Get it while it is here. These are all a limited edition.
Please keep in mind these are a custom item and there may be variations with the toppers and fabric. But they will be the same fabric and toppers you see here:)

Set includes:

Three Pin Toppers:
Sheep
Tree
House

name: Owl Door Stop and Bookend Pattern Wolly
description:
This an adorable Bookend or Door Stop just waiting to be perched by your Books or Door. The pattern comes complete with step by step instructions and pictures. This is a very easy and quick project. He is approximately 6" by 5" when finished. He can be made larger or smaller by simply enlarging or reducing the pattern. He is made with Felt eyes and any type of fabric you like. I have also included a bonus Tutorial on how to make your own tags/labels.

Includes:
What you will need List
Printable Pattern
Step by Step Instructions with Pictures
Tag Tutorial
Hints and tips to help make ti easier

9 page Tutorial and Instructions
Plus I am here anytime you need help!

This is a PDF complete with step by step instructions and pictures to make these. They are relatively easy to make and can be made by a beginner or expert. I do recommend some basic sewing skills for this pattern. Once purchased they will be emailed to you within 24 hours. Please leave your email address in the notes so that I will know where you want me to send it. Your are free to ask me for help, problems, or any questions at anytime!

Conditions of use:
This once purchased is free to use for any personal and non-commercial use.
You may not sell the finished product with this pattern. I have other patterns that may be made and sold for commercial use but this one is strictly for personal and noncommercial use.

This cute purse is a great project that is easy to make and doesn't take long at all. It comes with lots of goodies, quicker steps, and tips! You will get instructions complete with pictures for every step, printable templates, a what you will need list, and two bonuses. I have included how to make your own tags and a manual version of how to make the templates incase you do not have a printer (excluding the flap). Also you can reduce or enlarge templates to make the purse any size you like.

The purse size once completed is approximate 11 1/4" across the bottom and 10 1/2" across the top. It is 9 1/2" tall and 3" deep. The straps are 8" long.

Instructions and Templates come with:
What you will need list
Printable Templates of Pattern
Step by step instructions
Pictures for every step
Bonus- How to make your own tags
Bonus- Manual instructions for making pattern

This is a PDF complete with step by step instructions and pictures to make these. They are relatively easy to make and can be made by a beginner or expert. I do recommend some basic sewing skills for this pattern. Once purchased they will be emailed to you within 24 hours. Please leave your email address in the notes so that I will know where you want me to send it. Your are free to convo me with help, problems, or any questions at anytime!

Conditions of use:
This once purchased is free to use for any personal and non-commercial use.
You may sell the finished product with this pattern provided you state in all written forms that it was "made with a Flutterbys and Flowers pattern". Items must be made by you and can not be mass produced with anyone else. Redistributing this pattern in any form is expressly prohibited.

name: Pillow Owl Emily
description:
Meet Emily the "Sleep Tight Pillow Owl.tm"! She is just as adorable as can be. She loves to sleep all day on your bed or favorite spot. But once you go to sleep she is awake and ever watchful over you! She is made with Amy Butler's Full Moon Polka Dots and Rachel Millers Shabby Chic Blue Hydrangea Cotton Fabrics. She will match perfectly with most Shabby Chic linens. Her eyes and beak are hand sewn and made of felt. She is filled tightly with polyfill. You will fall in love with Emily as soon as she arrives! She is my latest creation...the "Sleep Tight Pillow Owl tm."

She is approximately 10 1/2" wide by 12' tall.

Emily makes a perfect gift for anyone! She also is adorable in a nursery.

This is a custom order. Please allow 4 to 5 days for Emily to be made and shipped. I ship priority mail so she will only take 2 to 3 days to get to you once she is shipped.
